Detailed Description

Video recognition.

After getting frame from the camera, you can recognize forms in this frame.

  • convert the frame to binary format ( BinaryRGBFrame() )
  • next, you identify the form with IdentifyForm()

See also:
cam.h
Author:
Pierre SEGUIN. POB-Technology

UInt8 IdentifyForm ( const RGBFrame *  Frame,
Form *  ListOfForm,
const UInt8 *  Pattern 
)

Make a list of forms known in a binary picture.

The last parameter of the function is build by POB-TOOLS, POB Pattern. This tools produce a '.h' that contains an array of pattern.

Parameters:
[in] Frame : Pointer on a RGB Frame. This frame must be binary.
[out] ListOfForm : Pointer on an array of known forms.
[in] Pattern : Pointer on the pattern.
Returns:
Number of known forms and ListOfForm containing the form.
